title: Yuuwaku sareta Hanayome
sinopse:
In the Yuuwaku sareta Hanayome series:

1. Boukyaku no Kanata no Rakuen (Enticed by His Forgotten Lover)
2. Nikui noni Koishikute (Wanted by Her Lost Love)
3. Ai wo Shiranai Hanamuko (Tempted by Her Innocent Kiss)
4. Ai wo Kobamu Daifugou (Undone by Her Tender Touch)
